entry.title: Picture You
entry.summary:
Author: harpsichordsandthelit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,435Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 445

Summary: Clark Kent just moved into a new apartment. The building is nice. His neighbors are welcoming. He heard some good things about the guy who lived here before him.And then he received a postcard.  Hey, I used to live in your apartment. I’m drunk in Gotham, and it’s the only address I can think of. Happy Holidays. B. W.  Inspired by this Tumblr post

entry.title: A Movie Date
entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,985Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 78

Summary: While tackling what seems to be the biggest case of kidnapping ever seen, Superman and Batman find themselves trapped in the plot of a cheesy holiday romance movie.Clark, now playing a man who returns to his small town at Christmas to take over his family business, which is unfortunately under the threat of seizure, and Bruce as the guy in charge of collecting the store for the bank, have to find a way to escape this fictional Christmas town while being railroaded on the worst(best?) romance plot of their lives.

entry.title: welcome-ish
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,838Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 192

Summary: "I need... I want," Bruce pants, struggling to breathe and talk at the same time, "Fuck me, Clark..."And if Clark ever had any doubt, it vanishes now. The man beneath him, moaning and twisting under his touch, is Batman.There's no room left for questions. It's the same voice he heard months ago, pleading in the dark from a faceless man. Only this time, he's the one without a face. And this time, no one is eavesdropping on those sounds, because the one who used to listen is now the one making Bruce fall apart like this. (Or, Clark thinks Batman has a very nice voice. It's been stuck in his head ever since he accidentally heard him during… sex. There's something about Bruce Wayne's voice that feels strangely familiar.)

entry.title: Space love
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,597Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 330

Summary: "It means that a dangerous criminal has taken refuge on your planet, and currently his plans are unknown."It wasn't Hal Jordan who spoke, nor one of the other Lanterns. Instead, it was a man a little younger than Batman who appeared behind the Green Lanterns, dressed in a blue and red suit, with a cloak on which there was a pin to stop him from the characteristic S-shape.The man's eyes were blue, not Bruce's icy color, but more like Dick's, warm, gentle, and when he smiled, he had a dimple on his left cheek. He moved confidently and calmly, like someone who is used to entering a room and being heard."With a look like his, it doesn't have to be difficult," he thought absently.-----Overworked, without a real love life, and with Dick in full teenage rebellion, the last thing Bruce needs is to have to babysit the powerful alien the Lanterns have brought to the Watchtower.But Kal El has his ways of breaking down all Bruce's barriers.

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 102,242Chapters: 8/65Kudos: 213

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.ORThe one in which they are both trapped and enslaved by Clark's growing sexual desire and his alien physiology.
